TopicTitle: How do you create "dummy" KSCs on other planets?

Articles.Content: Apparently on Kerbin there are multiple "Kerbal Space Centres", all but one of which just serve as easter eggs/interesting challenges. Is there any way of modding extra dummy KSCs onto, say, Duna?
Never mind, I've sort of figured it out - use Kerbal Konstructs while on another planet. It's not a great solution though, seeing as all the models KK comes with have green bases...
